name: LoadingReadyRun - Lighter Colours (Forum Only)
description: Changes the LoadingReadyRun forums to a colour-scheme that is a bit easier on the eyes; dark text on a light background.
additional_info:
Features:
Changes spoiler text colour in order to keep it hidden. (Doesn't work on text that has been coloured by the user).
Links to external site for a different coloured version of the header banner, the new one fits this theme a little better.
Expands main window, pushing advertising off to the side.
Doesn't break any of the forum images or give them strange background clashes.

Version 1.0
Initial release.
